short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension for web content access for Google and YouTube by Net Protector Endpoint security.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Login controller:

This extension controls and restrict access to corporate Google accounts on endpoints, ensuring that they can only sign in to specified domains.
These domains will be authorized by their organization's security administrator using NPAV Endpoint security console.
This can be valuable for maintaining compliance and security within a corporate environment.

YouTube content manager:

This extension is used to restrict the access to YouTube videos for administrators specified categories ,channels and publishers.
These restrictions will be managed by NPAV Endpoint Security console.

features : 

Manage the Extension configuration centrally using NPAV Endpoint security.
The extension include monitoring and reporting features that allow administrators to track user activity,
identify compliance violations, and generate reports for auditing purposes.
Allows only domains authorized by organization's security administrator.
Blocking of personal user's accounts log-in.
Allows or blocks YouTube videos as per the policy assigned to endpoint by NPAV Endpoint Security Administrator
based on Video Category, Channel and Publisher.

This Extension is only be configured and used with NPAV Endpoint Security. The Endpoint does not have any option to configure and edit.
By Applying the Web content access policy this extension will install on endpoint under ExtensionInstallForcelist Chrome Policy.

Browser Support :Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge
